name: WallaBag Dark Nord Material Theme
description: A Dark Nord Material Theme for WallaBag - by J. SCOTT ELBLEIN ( https://geekdrop.com ) v1.0 This is based on the excellent Nord Theme color palette: https://www.nordtheme.com WallaBag theme based off of it's Material theme. Switch your Wallabag theme to it first. I've also included some of the other Nord palette colors in the comments where they all looked great to me & I couldn't really decide which I truly liked best there, (but I wanted to keep it mostly dark), so I (or you) could easily swap around later at will.
additional_info:
This was created specifically for and on a local/personal installation of WallaBag.

To match your WallaBag installation, use:
"Urls matching this regexp", and enter: .*/wallabag/web/.*
